name: Animal Sumo
description:
2 player Super Smash Bros style party game. Fight the other player off the cliffs till they loose all their lives. Play 1 of 4 cute rag doll animals with long necks  :D====}O<

Dash down in the air to push away the other player... it's more effective if you do it while wielding a baguette. 

Programing: Laszlo Bulatovic

Design: Fiona Feeney, Dani Prokisch
